The error code is E010. You have not purchased this channel. If you want to watch it, please contact the customer service center. If you have purchased this channel, please unplug the power supply of the set-top box. If you still ca n’t watch the video, please call the customer service center or search for the E010 processing steps on the Frequently Asked Questions on the official website. The error code is E200. No signal or signal is bad, please confirm whether the cable at the rear of the device is connected. If the error always exists, please reboot the device and try again. If you have any problem, please call customer service center or leave the message on the official website. The error code is E201. Channel searching, please wait for 10 minutes. If the error always exists, please reboot the device and try again. If you have any problem, please call customer service center or leave the message on the official website. The error code is E213. Please wait a moment for this channel signal adjustment. If the error always exists, please reboot the device and try again. If you have any problem, please call customer service center or leave the message on the official website. The error code is E301. Your STB is not authorized for use in the area, please call the customer service center. The error code is E501. Due to insufficient battery power in the remote control, the upgrade failed. Please replace the batteries to facilitate the version update. The error code is E502. The remote control software upgrade failed. Please try the operation again. The error code is E503. The remote control software upgrade timed out. Please try the operation again.
The error code is E504. The network is not connected, please replug the network cable. If you still have problems, please call the customer service center.
The error code is E505. Network signal abnormal, please replug the network cable. If you still have problems, please call the customer service center.
The error code is E506. ACS has not responded for a long time, please replug the network cable. If you still have problems, please call the customer service center. The error code is E507. This device has not yet been activated through ACS.
The error code is E508. The IP you connected is a non-TBC network, please check the network. If you still have problems, please call the customer service center.
The error code is E510. The license is not available, please check the network. If you still have problems, please call the customer service center.
The error code is E511. Your license is suspended, please call the customer service center. The error code is E512. Your device is not registered, please call the customer service center. E601. The HDD not ready E602. The HDD storage not enough E603. The HDD unplug on recording E604. The DVR license is not available E605. Record conflict E606 No signal while recording E611. The HDD unplug while playing recorded file. E612. No license can play recorded file. E621. The HDD storage space less than 250G. E622. The speed of HDD is too slow. E623, The format of HDD is incorrect. E624, The HDD partition is incorrect. E625, The HDD cannot get serial number.
Four-Digit Password Eight-Digit Password Incorrect password, please try again.
